channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Large pot holes on junction, 22nd May
item.description:
Near challenge motor company/howdens

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Saxon Way, Naunton, Cheltenham

item.title: Tree is damaged problem, 22nd May
item.description:
Tree is growing over the customers garden and hanging onto the cables, putting pressure on the cables. Customer s worried the live cables are going to snap. Can tree be cut back.
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Water flowing from drain outside Endsleigh Insurance building., 22nd May
item.description:
Drain outside Endsleigh on Shurdington Road A46 Severn Trent have provided a ref IRF 00010. Not them responsible for unblocking.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Shurdington Road, Brockworth, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Dangerous, very large overhanging branches., 22nd May
item.description:
Series of large oak tree branches above Langley Road. Some branches have recently fallen. Need tree surgeon assessment urgently.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Langley Road, Winchcombe, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: A pothole across the road as you turn into Crescent Terrace, 22nd May
item.description:
It is near the corner probably in line with the pub on the left Thank you for your time today
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Crescent Terrace, Montpellier, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: The drain somewhere under this water appears to be blocked, 22nd May
item.description:
Drain outside 97 bouncers Lane by the junction of whitethorn drive and bouncers Lane is blocked

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 95, Bouncers Lane, Lynworth, Cheltenham

item.title: TMC - Defects - Other FW6 Surface problem, 22nd May
item.description:
28 day with 2 way traffic lights footway abrupt level difference due to with tarmac patch required 4000x900x30mm (FW6 Abrupt Level Differences)
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Several blocked drains causing massive puddle, 22nd May
item.description:
There are a number of blocked drains at the junction of Cleeveland Street and St Pauls Road. With heavy rain a very large puddle forms splashing pedestrians as cars cannot avoid it.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 63, Cleeveland Street, Wymans Brook, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: TMC - Defects -CW10 Potholes problem, 22nd May
item.description:
28 day with 15 minutes delay boards carriageway pothole 800x500x50mm (CW10 Pothole)
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: TMC - Defects -CW10 Potholes problem, 22nd May
item.description:
2 HOUR CARRIAGEWAY POTHOLE PLEASE MAKE AREA SAFE WITH BARRIERS. X4 BARRIERS AND X8 SANDBAGS. WILL PASS THIS ONTO LOCAL AHR AS THIS IS A SINKHOLE. (CW10 Pothole)
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: TMC - Defects - Vegetation problem, 22nd May
item.description:
NWD WITH INSIDE LANE CLOSURE AROUND ROUNDABOUT NEEDED PLEASE CUT BACK OVERGROWN TREE OBSTRUCTING THE TRAFFIC LIGHT ON THE ROUNDABOUT GRASS VERGE SIDE APPROPRIATELY 3 METER HIGH BY 3 METER WIDE (Overgrown Tree)

item.title: Completely blocks one lane of carriageway.very dangerous due to near by facilities, causes a backlog of double queue of vehicles causing blind spots for drivers, in a well used children, disabled and elderly area., 22nd May
